dev.grabert.reverseproxy.forwarding

Class ProxyHTTPController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.grabert.reverseproxy.forwarding.ProxyHTTPController

  • @RestController
public class ProxyHTTPController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Rest HTTP Controller that accepts all requests and forwards them to the downstream services. It is making use of LoadBalancer to figure out where to forward the incoming requests.
    Author:
    Markus Grabert
